div.bibl: Denni Hlasatel, Oct. 6, 1911. REPORT ON THE CORNER-STONE LAYING CEREMONIES OF THE VOJTA NAPRSTEK CZECH LIBERAL SCHOOL IN CHICAGO HELD ON APRIL 2. (Summary)

body.p: This article shows a list of names of the contributors, together with amounts contributed. Receipts from other sources also accounted for.

row.cell: Total receipts for the occasion were:
Clear profit for the benefit of the school was:

body.p: The committee thanks all contributors and friends for their generosity.
